titleStmt.title: An epistle to the Right Honourable Charles, Earl of Dorset and Middlesex, Lord Chamberlain of His Majesties houshold [sic]
titleStmt.author: Halifax, Charles Montagu, Earl of, 1661-1715.

notesStmt.note: Ascribed to Charles Montagu, Earl of Halifax. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
